FuncDef: This command displays IGMP snooping statistics for the VPLS service.

ParaDef.Info: Displays IGMP snooping statistics for a specific SAP.
Displays the IGMP snooping statistics for a specific spoke or mesh SDP. Values-1 to 17407.
The virtual circuit ID on the SDP ID for which to display information. Values-1 to 4294967295. ParamDefault: Default- For mesh SDPs only, all VC IDs
